narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I was able to reflect on this year's summer experience as an intern. Writing the reflection paper really helped me review what I did in the internship, what I learned, and how I can apply my experience in future career.
I learned more about what my internship provided me with (insights, skills, experience) in order to help further my academic and professional career.
Analysis of my summer internship experience.
very good to reflect on my summer experiences, and the impact it has had on my time at Yale post the experience
I reflected on a past summer internship.
Knowledge related to my major
This is a great course to think about an internship experience and reflect on the ways it changed your future plans.
I learned a lot from my internship
i reflected on my summer experience
It was a good opportunity to reflect on holistic college experience and profession ventures
finished my internship
I learned to reflect on an internship.
I was able to reflect on my summer work experience and how they relate to my future career goals.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Very good opportunity to reflect on past experience. I liked the amount of pages required for the paper.
P/F makes it very low commitment, only one final paper
Allows for thoughtful reflection and approves CPT authorization for international students!
It does the job!

It was well done - I wouldnt change anything. Maybe offering an advisor for support during the internship would be good.

It helps international students be able to participate in internships in the US.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: You're probably only here if you have to take it, so...

I mean, it's great to not get deported.
great way to get CPT
